title: Ripple CEO Expects SEC to Lose Against Ethereum, Mirroring XRP Lawsuit Outcome
description: Ripple’s chief executive believes the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) will be unsuccessful in classifying ether as a security, similar to how the agency lost its legal battle, for the most part, against XRP. Noting that the SEC has been “losing badly in courts” against crypto firms, the Ripple CEO stated: “At what point […]

title: Research Reveals Vast Potential for Automation of Government Services
description: A recent comprehensive study conducted by Alan Turing Institute has illuminated substantial potential for the automation of governmental Services. Particularly, those involving decision-making and information exchange between government agencies and citizens. This groundbreaking research, which delved into the intricate landscape of UK central government departments and public bodies, offers profound insights into the transformative power […]
